channel.title: I need a good source, please help. Read for more info
channel.description: Hello. I'm sorry to bother by posting a thread about this. But I'm looking for a fairly updated source close to EoC but not the EoC. I also wish to play one with normal xp gaining, with NPC's and a pretty much everything working. Can someone please help me?
